Bitmoji is a unique Chrome Extension designed to enhance digital communication by allowing users to directly insert customizable emojis, aka Bitmojis, into Gmail and almost any web platform. Unique Bitmoji avatars can be created through the mobile app. Support is available at the Bitmoji help center.



Directly insert Bitmojis into Gmail
Click and drag to resize them
Copy and paste them almost anywhere
